title: Solar Orbiter Radio and Plasma Wave, Level 2 Low Frequency Receiver (LFR) Basic Parameter Set 2 (BP2) Data in Survey Mode - M.Maksimovic (LESIA, Observatoire de Paris-CNRS)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/rpw/science/l2/lfr-surv-bp2/2020/solo_l2_rpw-lfr-surv-bp2_20200615_v06.cdf. The most common cadence, 2029440 [ns] = PT0.002029S, occurred for 8.9004% of the 1151 timesteps.

parameters.name: SURVEY_MODE
parameters.description: LFR survey mode (0 for normal mode, 1 for burst mode)
